articles.title: Sen. Manchin explains why he changed his mind on massive bill - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper asks Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV) why he agreed to sign onto Sen. Chuck Schumer's bill on taxes, healthcare and the climate after earlier signaling he would not support it.

articles.author: Clare Foran and Ali Zaslav, CNN
articles.title: Senate takes key vote to advance Democrats' sweeping health care and climate bill
articles.description: The Senate took a key vote on Saturday to advance Democrats' sweeping health care and climate bill toward final passage -- putting the package on track to pass the chamber as soon as this weekend.

articles.author: Raja Razek and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Thousands of dead fish are washing up along a California river. It's because of a massive wildfire and flash floods, the Karuk Tribe says
articles.description: "Tens of thousands" of dead fish have washed up along the Klamath River in the area of Happy Camp in northern California this week -- a phenomenon that's tied to a dangerous combination of flash flooding and the McKinney Fire that's burning in the area, accor…

articles.author: Amanda Musa, CNN
articles.title: Some of the approximately 1,000 people stranded at Death Valley National Park have left in spite of flooding
articles.description: Death Valley National Park announced its closure Friday due to substantial flooding within the park, according to a news release.

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Katie Lobosco, CNN
articles.title: What's in the Manchin-Schumer deal on climate, health care and taxes
articles.description: The Democrats' budget reconciliation package, which gained more heft after West Virginia Sen. Joe Manchin agreed to add back several climate and tax provisions, is getting closer to a vote in the Senate.

articles.author: Tami Luhby and Ella Nilsen, CNN
articles.title: How the climate bill could save you money on electricity, cars and appliances
articles.description: Democrats' new climate bill contains a bevy of tax incentives aimed at pushing consumers, developers, small businesses and others towards clean energy.

articles.author: Uliana Pavlova and Jonny Hallam, CNN
articles.title: Top Russian hypersonic missile scientist arrested on treason charge
articles.description: A leading Russian scientist in hypersonic flight was arrested on suspicion of treason on Friday, according to Russian state media.

articles.title: Opinion: 5 ways the Inflation Reduction Act will help American families
articles.description: The proposed legislation will lead to lower energy costs for families, create more job opportunities and make health care more affordable.

articles.author: Analysis by Brandon Tensley, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Why climate change hits some communities harder than others
articles.description: The flooding in Kentucky throws a light on a wider truth: Low-income communities and communities of color bear the brunt of the climate crisis.

articles.author: Francesca Street, CNN
articles.title: 'Unsustainable and shambolic': Flight attendants speak out on summer travel chaos
articles.description: As flights are canceled, luggage is mislaid, and travelers losing confidence in the aviation industry, flight attendants from across the globe say they're struggling
articles.content:
(CNN) British flight attendant Kris Major has worked in aviation for over two decades. He's seen the industry suffer and recover in the wake of 9/11, SARS and foot and mouth disease.
